about_the_game:
Holostar Command is a fast-paced shooter game that brings Classic Mid-20th Century Space Arcade Games into the 21st Century and right into your living room! Today's tech, Virtual, Mixed & Augmented Realities, with a little nostalgia tossed in to honor the games we loved from days gone by... Join Commander Wolff, her team and us on the quest to bring stability to the Cosmos. We believe that with your help, Freedom and Peace will reign in all Galaxies, in all time & in all space... Thanks for being part of the Cosmic Picture!

Commander Carole Wolff, coming from very humble beginnings, leads the team. At this point, she is extremely experienced with battle scenarios and tactics. So, all future commanders serve under Carole and learn by example before obtaining there own ship. Mutual trust and friendship is extreme. Once serving under commander Wolff, all team members come together with such camaraderie that team members have no fear and will do what it takes to honor everyone on the team to the point where death of a team member is NOT an option. No member is expendable! To date, even under extreme conditions and countless battles, not even one member of the Holostar Command team has ever been lost. Honor is of top concern!

Are you up to the challenge? If so,you are a Master Holostar, prepared to teleport through time and across Galaxies! Your Mission: To assist and replace a fallen Commander and to battle evil and to bring order to the Cosmos! The Commanders are fearless! Do you, have what it takes? The battles are fierce as the HOSTILES TAKE NO PRISONERS AND GIVE NO QUARTER!

A teleport system which causes your appearance to change to match the location, time and culture, gets you to your destination instantly! If you can stand up to the challenge of each battle in different regions of space & time, and with and against different beings, you can be a Commander of Commanders; and maybe, reach the level of the infamous Wolff!

content_descriptors.notes: This game has NO seeable mature content and is NOT accessible or presented in the game scenes. The Avatars are anatomically correct and even though fully clothed, in the game files the Avatars skin textures are accurate. These files will be revised very soon and the game files will be updated to remove this warning.

detailed_description:
Holostar Command is a fast-paced shooter game that brings Classic Mid-20th Century Space Arcade Games into the 21st Century and right into your living room! Today's tech, Virtual, Mixed & Augmented Realities, with a little nostalgia tossed in to honor the games we loved from days gone by... Join Commander Wolff, her team and us on the quest to bring stability to the Cosmos. We believe that with your help, Freedom and Peace will reign in all Galaxies, in all time & in all space... Thanks for being part of the Cosmic Picture!

Commander Carole Wolff, coming from very humble beginnings, leads the team. At this point, she is extremely experienced with battle scenarios and tactics. So, all future commanders serve under Carole and learn by example before obtaining there own ship. Mutual trust and friendship is extreme. Once serving under commander Wolff, all team members come together with such camaraderie that team members have no fear and will do what it takes to honor everyone on the team to the point where death of a team member is NOT an option. No member is expendable! To date, even under extreme conditions and countless battles, not even one member of the Holostar Command team has ever been lost. Honor is of top concern!

Are you up to the challenge? If so,you are a Master Holostar, prepared to teleport through time and across Galaxies! Your Mission: To assist and replace a fallen Commander and to battle evil and to bring order to the Cosmos! The Commanders are fearless! Do you, have what it takes? The battles are fierce as the HOSTILES TAKE NO PRISONERS AND GIVE NO QUARTER!

A teleport system which causes your appearance to change to match the location, time and culture, gets you to your destination instantly! If you can stand up to the challenge of each battle in different regions of space & time, and with and against different beings, you can be a Commander of Commanders; and maybe, reach the level of the infamous Wolff!
legal_notice:
HOLOSTAR COMMAND ART WORK GUIDELINES:

Holostar Command art works may not be used in any manner that might imply that any non-Holostar Command materials are sponsored, endorsed, licensed by, or affiliated with Holostar Command, LLC.

Holostar Command art works may not be displayed as primary or prominent features on any non-Holostar Command, LLC materials.

Holostar Command, LLC reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to modify guidelines regarding the Holostar Command art work, and may request that third parties modify or delete any use of the art work that, in Holostar Command, LLC's sole judgment, does not comply with these guidelines or might otherwise impair Holostar Command, LLC's rights.

Holostar Command, LLC further reserves the right to object to unfair uses or misuse of its art work or other violations of applicable laws.

Holostar Command, LLC also reserves the right to approve any communication using the Holostar Command, LLC art work before its distribution.

Holostar Command, LLC asks that prior to any use of Holostar Command art works that potential 3rd party use be approved by Holostar Command, LLC.

For approval of use of Holostar Command art works, please e-mail and write to commanderwolff@holostarcommand.com

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra
  • Processor: Hexa Core 2.6 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo speakers with high dynamic range
  • Additional Notes: The more RAM, the faster she'll run... Blast Blast Blast...
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8th Gen Hexa Core 3.0 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Processor: 8th Gen Hexa Core 3.0 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5300M 4GB GDDR6
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 128 GB available space
  • Sound Card: High-fidelity six-speaker system
  • Additional Notes: The more RAM, the faster she'll run... Blast Blast Blast...
